### Bio

Alexander Ek is a Postdoctoral Research in the the [Declarative Languages and Artificial Intelligence](https://dtai.cs.kuleuven.be/) Section at [KU Leuven](https://www.kuleuven.be/english/kuleuven/). In 2022, He received his PhD degree in computer science from [Monash University](https://www.monash.edu/). Most of his research centres around combinatorial optimisation, data- and logic-driven decision-making under uncertainty, proof-logging, and trustworthy and explainable AI/software/elections.
